item.title: The Problem
item.description: We aim to drastically reduce the impact of personal mobility on the world. Private cars account for 13% of Europe’s total greenhouse gas emissions. And they are deeply inefficient: a typical car consumes approximately 10 times more energy per kilometer than riding a bike. But emissions are just one problem. Cars also drive traffic congestion, parking shortages, noise pollution, and many other concerning issues. 80% of trips in Europe are under 10 km, with an average of just 1.
